derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via French from Turkish tülbent, from Persian dulband. Compare with tulip

entry.tran: (锡克教男教徒及一些印度教伊斯兰教男人缠在头上的)包头巾
entry.def: A turban is a long piece of cloth that is wound round the head. It is worn by Sikh men and by some Hindu and Muslim men.

means.word_mean: 1. a traditional Muslim headdress consisting of a long scarf wrapped around the head
